original_text: So Tamar went to Amnon's house. He was lying down on his bed. She took some flour and water and she mixed them together. She made the cakes while he watched her. Then she baked them.
korean_text: 다말이 그 오라버니 암논의 집에 이르매 그가 누웠더라 다말이 밀가루를 가지고 반죽하여 그가 보는 데서 과자를 만들고 그 과자를 굽고

sentences.original_text: So Tamar went to Amnon's house.
He was lying down on his bed.
She took some flour and water
She made the cakes while he watched her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그가 지켜보는 동안 케이크를 만들었습니다.
